content.body: annevk: I discussed https://github.com/w3c/mathml-core/issues/142 with emilio today, we think `a href` seems nicer/better long-term

content.body: rniwa is not in this room?  I know I spoke to him about this when that issue was ongoing.  It's nice that there is some discussion abotu MathML related stuff - how about joining the WG and coming to a WG meeting :). They're only once a month and not even every month.
